verses.verse: Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H8154>rob<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1637>threshingfloors.<s%>

Therefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7084>Keilah.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> how <S%H637>much<s%> more then <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H1980>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and brought <S%H5090>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%> So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> that he came <S%H3381>down<s%> with an <S%H646>ephod<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5234>delivered<s%> him into mine <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is shut <S%H5462>in,<s%> by <S%H935>entering<s%> into a <S%H5892>town<s%> that hath <S%H1817>gates<s%> and <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> together to <S%H4421>war,<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> to <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> secretly <S%H2790>practiced<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him; and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> Bring <S%H5066>hither<s%> the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath certainly <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8085><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> for my <S%H5668>sake.<s%>

Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> deliver me <S%H5462>up<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand?<s%> will <S%H7586>Saul<s%> come <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard?<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> He will come <S%H3381>down.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> me and my <S%H376>men<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> They will deliver thee <S%H5462>up.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men,<s%> which were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H4480>Keilah,<s%> <S%H7084><s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H834>whithersoever<s%> they could <S%H1980>go.<s%> And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H4422>escaped<s%> from <S%H4480>Keilah;<s%> <S%H7084><s%> and he <S%H2308>forbore<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in <S%H4679>strongholds,<s%> and <S%H3427>remained<s%> in a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> him <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5315>life:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> was in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> in a <S%H2793>wood.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> into the <S%H2793>wood,<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in <S%H430>God.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> thee; and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt be <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4932>next<s%> unto thee; and <S%H3651>that<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth.<s%>

And they <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then came <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H2130>Ziphites<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> hide <S%H5641>himself<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us in <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood,<s%> in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H4480>south<s%> <S%H3225><s%> of <S%H3452>Jeshimon?<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O <S%H4428>king,<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H185>desire<s%> of thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> to come <S%H3381>down;<s%> and our part shall be to <S%H5462>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H859>ye<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye have <S%H2550>compassion<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> me.

Go, <S%H1980><s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H5750>yet,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> his <S%H7272>haunt<s%> <S%H1961>is,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> him <S%H8033>there:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> me that <S%H1931>he<s%> dealeth very <S%H6191>subtlely.<s%> <S%H6191><s%>

See <S%H7200><s%> therefore, and take <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the lurking <S%H4224>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he hideth <S%H2244>himself,<s%> and come ye <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H3559>certainty,<s%> and I will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you: and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3426><s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> that I will search him <S%H2664>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And they <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul:<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon,<s%> in the <S%H6160>plain<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H3225>south<s%> of <S%H3452>Jeshimon.<s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> him. And they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> wherefore he came <S%H3381>down<s%> into a <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon.<s%> And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that, he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> on that <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> made <S%H1961>haste<s%> <S%H2648><s%> to get <S%H1980>away<s%> for fear <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5849>compassed<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> round about to <S%H8610>take<s%> them.

But there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4116>Haste<s%> thee, and <S%H1980>come;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6584>invaded<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H4480>pursuing<s%> <S%H7291><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5555>Sela-hammahlekoth.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> at <S%H5872>En-gedi.<s%>
